name: Awaken
description: Set in beautiful worlds and designed solely for VR, Awaken is a captivating puzzle game and rhythmic music experience. Become an architect of light, awaken the universe and bring back the stars. Awaken features both a campaign mode and a level creation mode to build puzzles and challenge friends.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 64-bit or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, GTX 1060, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10
